AclVoter - Annotation Type in grails.plugin.springsecurity.acl.annotation
Annotation for Controllers or Services at the class level or per-action/per-method, defining what roles and/or ACL voters are required for the entire controller or action.

Wrapper annotation that contains multiple AclVoter annotations.

GroovyAwareAclVoter - Class in grails.plugin.springsecurity.acl.access
Dummy voter that votes yes on Groovy methods like getMetaClass() since they wouldn't be secured but if all voters abstain access is denied.
GroovyAwareAclVoter() - Constructor for class grails.plugin.springsecurity.acl.access.GroovyAwareAclVoter

ProxyAwareParameterNameDiscoverer - Class in grails.plugin.springsecurity.acl
CGLIB proxies confuse parameter name discovery since the classes aren't compiled with debug, so find the corresponding method or constructor in the target and use that.
ProxyAwareParameterNameDiscoverer() - Constructor for class grails.plugin.springsecurity.acl.ProxyAwareParameterNameDiscoverer
